sys_hub_flow.name: NeedIt Fulfillment

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get approval from Requested for's Manager

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear ${assigned_to.first_name}, 

An overdue NeedIt Task is assigned to you:.

NumberTrigger➛NeedIt Record➛Number

 

Please complete this task as soon as possible..

 

Click here to view the NeedIt Task record: ${URI_REF}.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update NeedIt State to Closed Complete

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
